mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref) VALUES (seq_board.nextval,#{id},#{name},#{email},#{subject},#{content},seq_board.nextval)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, tt.* FROM (SELECT seq, name, email, subject, content, to_char(logtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') as logtime FROM board order by seq DESC) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
